billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Increases the penalty for any person who violates the provision that a pre-recorded message must disconnect upon the caller hanging up the telephone
summary: Increases the penalty for any person who violates the provision that a pre-recorded message must disconnect upon the caller hanging up the telephone.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the termination of pre-recorded telephone messages
